name: Advanced Genetics
description: The following topics are covered at an advanced level: extensions to Mendelian genetics, linkage and advanced mapping analyses, mutation, extrachromosomal inheritance, quantitative genetics, population and evolutionary genetics and genetics of behaviour. [24L, 12T] NOTE: BIO206H5 with NO practical component is not an acceptable pre-requisite for this course without BIO215H5.
prerequisites: 2013-14 and prior: BIO206H5, BIO207H5, BIO215H5; 2014-15 onward: BIO206H5, BIO207H5
